root: ^So have you heard there is a new Messenger?
^Oh! Have you seen them? What do they look like?
^You know I have bad eyesight I can not see that far.
^Is that the reason why you stand so close to me?
^How else would I be able to see those pretty eyes?
^My eyes looks exactley like everyone else...
^That might true, but no eyes light up like yours when you smile.
